subcategories.name: Small RC / off-road vehicles
subcategories.what_is_covered: 1/10-scale cars, ATVs, skid-steer rovers for field tests

subcategories.name: Quadrotors / drones
subcategories.what_is_covered: Four-rotor UAVs with cameras, LiDAR, IMU

subcategories.name: Simulated legged agents
subcategories.what_is_covered: Classic MuJoCo bodies for RL locomotion

subcategories.name: Real quadrupeds & hybrids
subcategories.typical_examples: ANYmal; Unitree A1/Go1; MIT Mini-Cheetah; wheel-leg hybrids

subcategories.name: Humanoids
subcategories.what_is_covered: High-DoF bipeds/humanoids, often with articulated hands

subcategories.name: Standard 6–7 DoF arms
subcategories.what_is_covered: Fixed-base arms with two-finger or suction grippers

subcategories.name: Franka-class agile arms
subcategories.typical_examples: Franka Emika Panda; Robotiq; suction cups

subcategories.name: Mobile / dual-arm manipulators
subcategories.what_is_covered: One or two arms on a wheeled base (bimanual possible)
subcategories.typical_examples: Mobile bases with dual arms; mobile manipulators

subcategories.name: Continuum / soft manipulators
subcategories.what_is_covered: Deformable backbones, pneumatic/tendon actuation, soft skins & grippers; tensegrity frames
subcategories.typical_examples: Soft continuum arm; soft gripper; compliant tensegrity structures
